item.title: 两家石油公司的广告显示了英国监管机构对 "绿色清洗 "的态度
item.description: 英国广告监管机构周三裁定，道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies SE）的一则广告夸大了该石油公司在可再生能源领域的投资，误导了消费者。而壳牌公司的另一则广告则宣传了其在电动汽车充电站和可再生能源以及海上天然气方面的投资，但监管机构认为该广告是可以接受的。【原文：An ad for TotalEnergies SE inflated the oil company’s investments in renewable energy, misleading consumers, the UK’s advertising regulator ruled on Wednesday. Another commercial for Shell, which promoted its investments in EV charging stations and renewable energy, as well as its offshore gas, was acceptable, it found.】

item.title: 中国电动汽车热潮掩盖了主要汽车枢纽的经济痛苦
item.description: 中国举世瞩目的电动汽车热潮掩盖了一边倒的经济收益，依赖外国汽车制造商的制造中心落后于比亚迪（BYD Co.【原文：China’s world-beating electric vehicle boom is masking lopsided economic gains, with manufacturing hubs that rely on foreign carmakers falling behind cities that are home to hugely popular domestic brands like BYD Co.】

item.title: 部长称欧盟可向特朗普提供甲烷帮助以促进液化天然气贸易
item.description: 立陶宛能源部长表示，作为在贸易问题上安抚美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的一揽子计划的一部分，欧盟应考虑调整其甲烷规定，以便能够进口更多的美国液化天然气。【原文：The European Union should look at tweaking its methane rules so it can import more US LNG as part of a package to placate US President Donald Trump on trade, according to Lithuania’s energy minister.】

item.description: 埃克森美孚公司 (Exxon Mobil Corp.) 在本代理季至少 25 年来首次没有面临任何股东提案。【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. is facing no shareholder proposals this proxy season for the first time in at least 25 years.】

item.title: 干燥温暖的天气过后，爱尔兰和英国面临野火高风险
item.description: 爱尔兰当局警告说，温暖干燥的气候条件加上枯死的植被，本周全国各地发生野火的风险很高。【原文：Irish authorities warned that warm and dry conditions, combined with dead vegetation, pose a high risk of wildfires across the country this week.】

item.title: 贝索斯投入资金培育更多气候友好型奶牛
item.description: 贝索斯地球基金（Bezos Earth Fund）正在为培育气候智能牛的研究项目投入资金，作为遏制牲畜对环境影响的努力的一部分。【原文：The Bezos Earth Fund is putting money into research programs to breed climate-smart cattle as part of efforts to curb the environmental impact of livestock.】

item.title: 特朗普下令挖掘煤炭资源，以求在人工智能领域占据主导地位
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）正着手扩大美国境内煤炭的开采和使用，为能源需求旺盛的数据中心提供动力，同时寻求重振日益衰落的美国化石燃料行业。【原文：President Donald Trump is moving to expand the mining and use of coal inside the US, a bid to power the boom in energy-hungry data centers while seeking to revive a declining US fossil fuel industry.】

item.title: 关税威胁进一步推高美国房屋保险费率
item.description: 一月份的洛杉矶大火以及上周给美国中西部地区带来洪水和龙卷风的强风暴，2025 年的极端天气已经开始侵袭美国的房屋。保险政策比较网站 Insurify 在一份新的报告中指出，房主应该预计他们的保险费率会相应地飙升。【原文：With the Los Angeles fires in January and last week’s severe storms that brought flooding and tornadoes to the Midwest, extreme weather is already battering US homes in 2025. Homeowners should expect their insurance rates to jump accordingly, says Insurify, an insurance policy comparison website, in a new report.】

item.title: 瑞银财富警告关税将对能源转型造成损害
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）全球财富管理部门的分析师表示，在世界两大经济体之间贸易关系持续脱钩的情况下，能源转型似乎将遭受重大打击。【原文：The energy transition looks set to suffer a meaningful blow amid the continued decoupling of trade ties between the world’s two largest economies, according to analysts at UBS Group AG’s global wealth management arm.】

item.title: 百岁初为人父？费城动物园的陆龟迎来宝宝
item.description: 费城，宾夕法尼亚州（美联社）— 费城动物园的一对极度濒危、近百岁高龄的加拉帕戈斯陆龟首次成为父母。【原文：PHILADELPHIA, Pa. (AP) — A pair of critically endangered, nearly 100-year-old Galapagos tortoises at the Philadelphia Zoo have become first-time parents.】

item.description: 据彭博社看到的文件显示，美国能源部正提议关闭其清洁能源示范办公室，并削减约 90 亿美元用于碳捕集、直接空气捕集、太阳能和氢能项目的奖励。【原文：The US Energy Department is proposing to shut down its Office of Clean Energy Demonstrations and cut some $9 billion in awards for programs regarding carbon capture, direct air capture, solar and hydrogen, according to documents seen by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 能源机构 8500 名 "非必要 "职位名单上的核弹工作人员
item.description: 美国能源部已将 8500 个工作岗位确定为 "非必要 "岗位，其中包括负责监督国家核武器储备的岗位。【原文：The US Energy Department has identified 8,500 jobs as “non-essential” — including positions that oversee the nation’s stockpile of nuclear weapons — as it prepares to cut employees in response to a mandate from Elon Musk’s government efficiency team.】

item.title: 美国气象局将反向保留研究网站
item.description: 美国国家海洋和大气管理局将保留与其研究部门相关网站的访问权限，此前该局曾取消了一份支持其许多网页的云网络服务合同。【原文：The US National Oceanic and Atmospheric Agency will preserve access to websites tied to its research division, after previously moving to cancel a cloud web services contract that supports many of its pages.】

item.title: 美国农业部开放 59% 的联邦森林供采伐以管理火灾风险
item.description: 农业部长布鲁克-罗林斯（Brooke Rollins）将近 1.13 亿英亩的森林（占联邦管理森林总面积的 59%）置于紧急状态下，旨在促进伐木和减少野火。【原文：Agriculture Secretary Brooke Rollins placed nearly 113 million acres of forest — amounting to 59% of all federally managed forests — under an emergency determination aimed at boosting logging and reducing wildfire.】
